segments.text: I look at the woman still focused on her plate, and I feel sadness wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be missing the excitement and danger unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches higher, teetering on the edge of the stool, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encourages him silently, her palm outstretched like a promise of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how easy it is to be so engrossed in routine that we miss crucial moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The ongoing spill from the sink is a metaphor for the chaos lurking beneath the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s astonishing how a kitchen can hold both comfort and danger at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
